thread.title: FBI Opens Internal Review of Handling of Gymnasts’ Sex-Abuse Allegations

author: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
title: FBI Opens Internal Review of Handling of Gymnasts’ Sex-Abuse Allegations

organizations.name: fbi opens internal review of handling of gymnasts

text:
The Federal Bureau of Investigation has opened an internal review of the bureau’s handling of sexual-abuse allegations against former U.S. national gymnastics team doctor Larry Nassar, people familiar with the matter said, in light of concerns that agents in multiple FBI field offices failed to act on gymnasts’ complaints in 2015. 

The investigation, conducted by the FBI’s Inspection Division in Washington, D.C., could shed light on why it took nearly a year for the FBI to open a criminal investigation into Dr. Nassar, during... RELATED VIDEO Aly Raisman Calls for an Independent Investigation of the USOC U.S. Olympic Gold Medalist Aly Raisman blasted the USOC and USA Gymnastics in a Lansing, Mich., courtroom on Friday before the sentencing of former team doctor Larry Nassar. Photo: AP (Originally published Jan. 24, 2018)
